"A.P.241/4/8/12:00": "The ARKS Ship sure is an amazing place. Their technology is on a whole different scale."
"If humans have progressed this far then, will Earth eventually become advanced like this?"
"Fufu, I don't know about that. For ARKS and Photoners to advance, Xion's existence was essential."
"If Earthlings leave out of space and come across an existence like Xion, then perhaps it might be possible."
"If you like, we can talk about it later."
"If someone as beautiful as yourself can tell me one-on-one, then I'll be happy to."
"Big bro!"
"I know, I know. Come on, that attitude of yours never changes, does it?"
"Now, I know I'm a bit late to say this after fighting and all, but let me introduce myself."
"Mother Cluster opposition force \"Earth Guide\" Member of the Far Eastern Branch, Enga Yasaka. Also..."
"The older brother of this overly confident idiot. Nice to work with you from now on."
"Big sis's older brother?"
"Yup, that's right."
"Then, you'll be my Big bro too?"
"Yup, call me what you like."
"Big bro!"
"Little bro!"
"What, Hitsugi? Are you jealous?"
"I'm not jealous! More importantly, explain yourself, big bro!"
"Even if you tell me to explain... We're Mother's enemy, and ARKS ally. Do I need to keep explaining?"
"I still don't understand! Like, why is Mother your enemy?! What in the world is Earth Guide?!"
"The Ether Infrastructure is being managed and controlled by Mother Cluster."
"In this computerized information technology, they control the foundation of this network. No country can interfere with them."
"If their intention was to destroy Earth, then it would be simple. They could just take control of some country's nuclear missiles. And then, the world could've ended easily."
"That said, Earth Guide is an organization that doesn't accept Mother Cluster's total control."
"We've investigated Mother Cluster's movements, and in order to figure out plans to counter them, became the first organization to interact with ARKS."
"Of course, because of that, Mother Cluster has set their eyes on us."
"Simply put, big bro's room was blown up because they found out that you were in Earth Guide? In other words, you had what was coming to you, right?"
"You idiot. It's because you betrayed Mother. As a consequence, I had my past history revealed as well. If we had to look back at the source, it's all your fault."
"Mmmgh!"
"Although, I didn't really have intentions of hiding anything anyway. Thanks to that, we managed to catch them, so it's all good, I guess."
"From the way those members of Mother Cluster made their grand appearance in the front lines means that Earth Guide  will act as well."
"To be clear, we intend to unite together with ARKS."
"Furthermore, we want to have meetings with ARKS and such."
"So, I was chosen as messenger. At least for now, I'll be staying here."
"Geh!"
"What, Hitsugi? you seem so happy."
"Do I look happy to you? You must have bad eyes."
"Don't hold back, we're only each other's relatives by blood, right? Come here, your Big brother can give you a nice hug."
"Idiot! I'm going out for a walk! Let's go Aru."
"Ah, wait up! Big sis!"
"Jeez, she's always so serious. Oh well, I guess this works out too."
"Allow me to give my thanks again. Thank you for rescuing Hitsugi. As her older brother, I give you my gratitude, from the bottom of my heart."
"Even though she's so reckless, and a hopeless idiot, she's still my sister."
"You're my sister's saviours. For that, I thank you."
